content: 1 attach according to directions above decrease with the first leg of double_crochet going into the first flo and second leg going into the second flo slip_stitch into second flo fasten off designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items assembly fold brim back down stuff gnome use tail from body to cinch bottom closed weave in ends reference photo enjoy your new small no sew gnome if you would like to support my designs you can buy me a coffee on venmo @thoseyellowthings designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items
